page.title: 07Village Church-NE. Tiverton
page.content: The Vicar of Chevithorne lives in a lovley old vicarage designed by Burgess in 1871. Burgess is the man who designed Knightshayes Court. The Vicar is part of the Exe Valley Churches Team Ministry which consists of three Ministers serving fourteen village churches. The Vicar holds services in St.Thomas' Church every week. Some of these services are united with people from the Methodist Chapel in Chevithorne. There are about twentysix people who attend church. They come from all around the area. The Vicar's job, as well as organising Sunday services, involves meetings and visits to people and sometimes a funeral. Some clubs,such as the Young Farmers, hold their meetings at the vicarage.
